verbose_text: To determine the functional role of SIRT1 in forebrain excitatory neurons, we generated mice lacking SIRT1 activity in forebrain glutamatergic neurons by crossing SIRT1 flox / flox mice, in which exon 4 of the SIRT1 gene is flanked by loxP sites, with Emx1-ires-Cre mice having the endogenous Emx1 locus directing expression of Cre recombinase to the vast majority of glutamatergic neurons in the neocortex and hippocampus [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
